'''Wanika''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The local armorer, Wanika supplies tools of war to locals and tourists alike.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Weapons and armor, including the unique [Heaven's Cacophony](/heavensCacophony/), [Horns of The Bleak Mother](/hornsOfTheBleakMother/), [Gatecrashers](/gatecrashers/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* Damaging one of the kegs of gunpowder next to her shop will elicit a reaction from Wanika.
}}

[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)
